code: import{v4 as uuid}from'uuid';import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'./types';export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){return function(dispatch){var id=uuid();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,payload:id});},4000);};};//use to help us export the alerts to alert.js present in reducers
